-- | a library with examples of using Conductive with hsc3

--   This library contains examples of using Conductive with hsc3.
@package conductive-hsc3
@version 0.3.1

module Sound.Conductive.Synths
pingDef :: IO OSC
ping :: Double -> Double -> IO ()
defineSynth :: UGen -> String -> IO OSC
playSynth :: [(String, Double)] -> String -> IO ()
pingDef2 :: IO OSC
ping2 :: Double -> Double -> IO ()
pmTestDef :: IO OSC
pmTest :: Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> IO ()

rudeBass :: Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> IO ()
